entries.name: Air Elemental
entries.description: A living vortex of wind and air.

data.damageResistances: lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
data.conditionImmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Air Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked prone.

entries.name: Barbed Devil
entries.description: A hulking, humanoid devil covered in sharp barbs.

data.damageResistances: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Barbed Hide
traits.description: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals 5 (1d10) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

entries.name: Beholder Zombie
entries.description: An undead beholder animated by necromantic energy.

data.languages: understands Deep Speech and Undercommon but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eye Ray
actions.description:
The zombie uses a random magical eye ray, choosing one target it can see within 60 feet of it.

1. Paralyzing Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

2. Fear Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

3. Enervation Ray: The targeted creature must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

4. Disintegration Ray: If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 45 (10d8) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust. If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without a saving throw. If the target is a Huge or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

entries.name: Bulette
entries.description: A massive burrowing predator known as a land shark.

data.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.description: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Deadly Leap
actions.description: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a DC 16 Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked prone and take 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked prone, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is within range, the creature instead falls prone in the bulette's space.

entries.name: Earth Elemental
entries.description: A living mass of earth and stone.

data.damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
data.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Fire Elemental
entries.description: A roaring inferno given form and will.

data.damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
data.conditionImmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.description: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.description: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 feet.

traits.name: Water Susceptibility
traits.description: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two touch attacks.

actions.name: Touch
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

entries.name: Flesh Golem
entries.description: A construct of stitched-together body parts animated by magic.

data.damageImmunities: lightning, poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
data.conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
data.languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.description: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

traits.name: Aversion of Fire
traits.description: If the golem takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Giant Crocodile
entries.description: A massive reptilian predator with powerful jaws.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.description: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Giant Shark
entries.description: An enormous predatory fish of the deep.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.description: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.description: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

entries.name: Gladiator
entries.description: A seasoned arena fighter trained in deadly combat.

traits.name: Brave
traits.description: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Brute
traits.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

reactions.name: Parry
reactions.description: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

entries.name: Gorgon
entries.description: A massive iron-scaled bull that breathes petrifying gas.

traits.name: Trampling Charge
traits.description: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

entries.name: Half-Red Dragon Veteran
entries.description: A veteran warrior infused with the blood of a red dragon.

data.senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 12

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The veteran makes two longsword attacks. If it has a shortsword drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The veteran exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Hill Giant
entries.description: A massive, dim-witted brute that lives in hills and mountains.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

entries.name: Mezzoloth
entries.description: A fiendish warrior from the Lower Planes.

data.damageResistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The mezzoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The mezzoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The mezzoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). The mezzoloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

2/day each: darkness, dispel magic
1/day: cloudkill

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The mezzoloth makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its trident.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.description: The mezzoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

entries.name: Night Hag
entries.description: A fiendish hag that invades dreams and devours souls.

data.damageResistances: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: detect magic, magic missile
2/day each: plane shift (self only), ray of enfeeblement, sleep

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Claws (Hag Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.description: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium female humanoid, or back into her true form. Her statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. She reverts to her true form if she dies.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.description: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

actions.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day)
actions.description: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or similar magic.

entries.name: Otyugh
entries.description: A filth-eating aberration with tentacles and a huge maw.

traits.name: Limited Telepathy
traits.description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its tentacles.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against disease or become poisoned until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 4 (1d8) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and restrained until the grapple ends. The otyugh has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.description: The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage and be stunned until the end of the otyugh's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.

entries.name: Red Slaad
entries.description: A chaotic frog-like creature from the plane of Limbo.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be infected with a disease called chaos phage. While infected, the target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours. If the disease reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target instantly transforms into a red slaad or, if it has the ability to cast spells of 3rd level or higher, a green slaad. Only a wish spell can reverse the transformation.

entries.name: Revenant
entries.description: An undead warrior driven by a single-minded desire for vengeance.

data.conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, stunned
data.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The revenant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the revenant takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the revenant's next turn. The revenant's body is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.description: When the revenant's body is destroyed, its soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another humanoid corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.description: The revenant is immune to effects that turn undead.

traits.name: Vengeful Tracker
traits.description: The revenant knows the distance to and direction of any creature against which it seeks revenge, even if the creature and the revenant are on different planes of existence. If the creature being tracked by the revenant dies, the revenant knows.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The revenant makes two fist attacks.

actions.name: Fist
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature against which the revenant has sworn vengeance, the target takes an extra 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, the revenant can grapple the target (escape DC 14) provided the target is Large or smaller.

actions.name: Vengeful Glare
actions.description: The revenant targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it and against which it has sworn vengeance. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is paralyzed until the revenant deals damage to it, or until the end of the revenant's next turn. When the paralysis ends, the target is frightened of the revenant for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if it can see the revenant, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

entries.name: Roper
entries.description: A cave-dwelling predator that resembles a stalagmite.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

traits.name: Grasping Tendrils
traits.description: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Strength check against it.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The roper makes four attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tendril
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 50 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained and has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

actions.name: Reel
actions.description: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 feet straight toward it.

entries.name: Salamander
entries.description: A serpentine elemental creature wreathed in flames.

data.damageResistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Heated Weapons
traits.description: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The salamander makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

actions.name: Spear
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the salamander can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the salamander can't make tail attacks against other targets.

entries.name: Sahuagin Baron
entries.description: A powerful leader of the shark-worshipping sahuagin.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.description: The baron has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.description: The baron can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.description: The baron can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The baron makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws or trident.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

entries.name: Shambling Mound
entries.description: A massive heap of rotting vegetation animated by dark magic.

data.senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.description: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled (escape DC 14), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.description: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

entries.name: Troll
entries.description: A voracious regenerating humanoid with a seemingly endless hunger.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Unicorn
entries.description: A noble and pure celestial horse with a spiraling horn.

traits.name: Charge
traits.description: If the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description:
The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

At will: detect evil and good, druidcraft, pass without trace
1/day each: calm emotions, dispel evil and good, entangle

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: The unicorn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.description: The unicorn's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its hooves and one with its horn.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Horn
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Healing Touch (3/Day)
actions.description: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

actions.name: Teleport (1/Day)
actions.description: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

legendaryActions.name: Hooves
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.

legendaryActions.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

legendaryActions.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)
legendaryActions.description: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.

entries.name: Vampire Spawn
entries.description: A lesser vampire created by a true vampire's bite.

data.damageResistances: necrotic; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
data.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.description:
The vampire has the following flaws:

Forbiddance: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water: The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart: The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity: The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Claws
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 13).

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

entries.name: Water Elemental
entries.description: A living wave of water with a malevolent will.

data.damageResistances: acid; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
data.conditionImmunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.name: Water Form
traits.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Freeze
traits.description: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Whelm (Recharge 4-6)
actions.description: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space. The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a DC 14 Strength check and succeeding.

entries.name: Werebear
entries.description: A lycanthrope that can transform into a bear or bear-humanoid hybrid.

data.acType: 11 in bear or hybrid form (natural armor)
data.speed: 30 ft. (40 ft., climb 30 ft. in bear or hybrid form)
data.damageImmunities: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.description: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: In bear form, the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form, it makes two greataxe attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a bear or a humanoid.

actions.name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

entries.name: Wraith
entries.description: A malevolent undead spirit that drains life force.

data.damageResistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered
data.conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
data.languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.description: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Create Specter
actions.description: The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently. The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.

entries.name: Xorn
entries.description: A bizarre creature from the Elemental Plane of Earth that feeds on minerals.

data.damageResistances: piercing and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
data.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.description: The xorn has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.description: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

entries.name: Young Remorhaz
entries.description: A young but still dangerous arctic predator with a superheated body.

data.senses: darkvision 60 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.description: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage.
